snippet: Mr. Lacy led the case against Ernest Avants for the murder of a black sharecropper, Ben Chester White, whose death was part of a failed plot to kill the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.
abstract: Jack Lacy, who as an assistant United States attorney led the successful prosecution of a former Ku Klux Klansman charged in a failed plot to assassinate the Rev Dr Martin Luther King Jr, dies at age 69.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Lacy led the case against Ernest Avants for the murder of a black sharecropper, Ben Chester White, whose death was part of a failed plot to kill the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.

headline.seo: Jack Lacy Jr. Dies at 69; Prosecuted Klansman in Killing
headline.main: Jack Lacy, Who Prosecuted Klansman, Dies at 69
